title: Basic Usage
content: The data attribute must be set to set the bulletin information data, and the tab-title attribute must be set to set the title of each bulletin board.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: Billboard Title
content: You can use title to set the bulletin board title.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: Default Activated Tab
content: You can set the default active tab by active-name, starting from 1.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: Tab Title
content: You can customize the tab title by using the tab-title attribute.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: URL-based redirection
content: The URL-based redirection is based on the url and target fields in the data.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: Route-based redirection
content: Route-based redirection is performed based on the route field in the data.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: Show More links
content: You can use more-link to display and set more links. show-more Sets whether to display the More button. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.

title: User-defined bulletin prefix
content: You can use icon to customize the new bulletin prefix icon.
findIntroStr: BulletinBoard bulletin board component, which displays the information that needs to be paid attention to.
